Truth be told\n(诉说真相之路)
It's a lonely road\n(充满着孤独)
Chasing your dreams\n(追逐梦想时)
And all that we are\n(我们拥有的一切)
And could ever be\n(我们能做的一切)
Is within our reach\n(终究是有限的)
Ignite the fire\n(点燃圣火)
Pure hearts can never expire\n(纯洁之心永不枯朽)

;//原始文本: May the bridges that we burn
